entries.title: Google vs. ChatGPT: Here's what happened when I swapped services for a day
entries.description: OpenAI's ChatGPT chatbot has been getting a lot of attention for its ability to provide answers to complicated queries. Could it someday replace Google?

entries.title: ECB hikes rates, sees significant increases ahead as it announces plan to shrink balance sheet
entries.description: The European Central Bank opted for a smaller rate hike at its Thursday meeting, taking its key rate from 1.5% to 2%.

entries.title: U.S. slaps restrictions on Chinese chipmaker and other companies over national security worries
entries.description: The new designations also take aim at Russia-linked entities supporting that country's military invasion of Ukraine, the Commerce Department said.

entries.title: Bank of England hikes key rate by 50 basis points, will continue to respond 'forcefully' if needed
entries.description: The central bank's Monetary Policy Committee voted 6-3 in favor of the half-percentage point hike.

entries.title: UN nuclear watchdog to visit Tehran as Iran enriches uranium at its highest level ever
entries.description: The IAEA will send a delegation to Tehran on Dec. 18 to clarify outstanding issues linked to nuclear particles discovered at undeclared Iranian sites.

entries.title: Prince Harry says Prince William screamed and shouted at him in new record-breaking Netflix documentary
entries.description: Prince Harry described the terror of being shouted at by his brother, Prince William, during a summit to discuss his and wife Meghan's royal roles, in a new Netflix documentary.

entries.title: Bitcoin drops following Fed decision after topping $18,000 for first time in over a month
entries.description: Bitcoin fell from the $18,000 mark after the Fed raised its benchmark interest rate and indicated there would be further hikes next year.

entries.title: Swiss central bank hikes interest rates by 50 basis points to counter 'further spread of inflation'
entries.description: The Swiss National Bank has increased its benchmark interest rate for the third time this year, taking it to 1%.

entries.title: China reopening brings both risks and opportunities, Asian Development Bank says
entries.description: China's reopening would pose both upside and downside risks to the country's economy, Albert Park, chief economist at the Asian Development Bank said.

entries.title: Recession fears could trigger a 'lipstick' effect on deal activity next year
entries.description: Global deal volume and size decreased this year amid macro headwinds. Recession fears could see buyers increasingly focus on smaller deals.

entries.title: Asia's year in review: Who had it good — and who had it bad — in 2022
entries.description: With hopes that Covid is in retreat and that inflation will moderate in the year ahead, we take a last look at who had it good and who had it bad in 2022.

entries.title: Elon Musk sells another huge chunk of Tesla shares
entries.description: The transactions took place between Monday and Wednesday this week according to the filings with the Securities and Exchange Commission.

entries.title: China's retail sales shrink far more than expected, while industrial production disappoints
entries.description: A day before the data release, China's National Bureau of Statistics canceled its in-person press conference set for Thursday without explanation.

entries.title: FTX insider turned on Sam Bankman-Fried days before bankruptcy, flagging potential fraud to regulators
entries.description: Former FTX co-CEO Ryan Salame disclosed "possible mishandling of clients' assets" by Sam Bankman-Fried to Bahamian regulators just before FTX bankruptcy filing.
